Articles.Content:
Can it PLEASE be implemented into the game that the arrow keys can be rebound to be used for flight function? This is a huge QOL issue for many people like myself when it comes to flying creations in the game. It makes absolutely no sense to have cameras hard-bound to arrow keys... the fact that made it into the core game is hilarious considering all the "improvements" we were promised from the first game.

 

Thanks.
